title: realbtc20
author: realbtc20
content: I know I am new here. Looking for some partners to develop a good and real utility as new btc20 with real utility not as a scam coin.  Looking for a partner for making a bridge to erc20, making some graphical work. Would be nice if there are users who are interested to work on this project with me. please send me private messages!

comments.author: Matoshi1
comments.body: Hi what you will like to call your coin?  And do you want your coin to be a fork of bitcoin?
